entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 p.m. ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Windy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
